mapper.select: select r.id as receiveId, r.sender_name as senderName, GET_DICTVALUE_BY_DICTKEY('XXZTDM',r.msg_state) as msgState, r.msg_id as msgId, t.id as id, t.subject as subject, t.content as content, GET_DICTVALUE_BY_DICTKEY('XXLXDM',t.type) as msgType, GET_DICTVALUE_BY_DICTKEY('XXDJDM',t.msg_level) as msgLevel, to_char(t.create_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as msgDateStr from SYS_MESSAGE t left join SYS_RECEIVE_BOX r on t.ID = r.MSG_ID where t.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.delete: delete from SYS_MESSAGE t where t.ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete from SYS_RECEIVE_BOX t where t.MSG_ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
